name: xz-decompress
description: XZ streaming decompression for the browser & Node without native code, via WebAssembly

scripts.setup-wasi-sdk: wasisdkroot=wasi-sdk && wasi_version=21 && rm -rf "${wasisdkroot}" && mkdir -p "${wasisdkroot}" && curl -fL -# "https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-sdk/releases/download/wasi-sdk-${wasi_version}/wasi-sdk-${wasi_version}.0-linux.tar.gz" | tar -xzf - -C "${wasisdkroot}" --strip-components 1

author: Tim Perry <tim@httptoolkit.com>
